You can use add-ons to enhance the functionality of . To configure the Add-ons options, and go to Add-ons . The following options are available in the Add-ons preferences page:
Enable automatic updates checking - When this option is selected, will search for available updates automatically.
Add-on Sites URLs - This is a list of the URLs for the add-on sites. You can add, edit, and delete sites in this list.
